name: Dark Podval
description:
Dark Podval - indie puzzle game made in 2D graphics, where you have to go through the labyrinths of the basement, solving problems and collecting coins that you will need later.

Background:

In one city, in an abandoned residential building, into which you wandered by accident, there is a mysterious staircase leading down into the terrible darkness. Despite common sense and reason, you began to descend...

What awaits you in the game:

- 5 story chapters
- Many "features" from buttons with doors to lasers with portals
- Level editor (after completing 5 chapters)
- Various in-game achievements
- In-game store with various goods that change the gameplay
